sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Programmer, Web and Mobile Application Developer
sellerCard.description: I am Md. Ehsan. This is a collective ground of Mobile App development,Web Development  And Web Research. Our team is comprised of  professional, devoted, and mindful experts in programming, coding, design, blogging, internet research, Android Development, web research and data entry. We can also provide virtual support as an assistant. We are providing excellent service for the last 10 years to achieve our clientsâ€™ satisfaction. You will absolutely get the best service from  us on Fiverr!

description.content:
Website customization? 

We are glad to help you in WordPress customization.


 Why you should choose me to do your work?

  • We have over 10 years of experience in WordPress development and developed a lot of WordPress themes and plugin.
  • We have successfully fixed over 3000 issues for clients.
  • Over past years We have created 400+ unique WordPress sites.


 Steps, how I will develop your full Website:

  1. Analysis core concept
  2. Planning technology and features
  3. Design and layout
  4. Content
  5. Development
  6. Testing
  7. Deployment


 Even I can also help to 

  • Website Creation
  • Customizing themes
  • Plugin Installation
  • Plugin Configuration
  • Plugin Customizing
  • Fix Broken Layout
  • Fix Responsive Issues
  • Installation and setup
  • Fix Server Error
  • Fix Error Establishing A Database Connection
  • Database Optimization
  • Market Analysis, Develop Concept
  • WordPress Web Security and Firewall setup
  • A/B testing


 Common Works

  • Personal WordPress website
  • Woocommerce / Dokan Site
  • School/ College Sites
  • Buddypress Community
  • Event Site
  • MemberShip Site
  • Company Website


Looking to be your wordpress developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much days should we give for a complete website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: It depends on your website features, if personal website, usually for a perfect website need 7 days and for a corporate company website need 7-30 days based on features

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer after support?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we do, until it is the scope of the order, we will give support even order is closed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you do theme or plugin development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Yes, we do, we have separate another gig dedicated for this
https://www.fiverr.com/ehsanul19/develop-and-customize-custom-wordpress-plugin

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do website support all devices?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we test your site on major devices and we do responsive design

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you do PWA (Progressive Web Apps)?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, if you want the service, we can add it with a nominal charge.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I need android application development as well?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Yes, we can offer you an endpoint for the android app as a separate service. As well, we do mobile app development. Check our gigs dedicated to it.

https://www.fiverr.com/ehsanul19/develop-your-creative-android-app-or-will-be-your-1st-android-developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: How you ensure website quality?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We do development in standard coding rules so we can give you cutting edge website to load fast, fewer conflicts, and good SEO. As well, we test thoroughly before delivering the website

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you offer documentation and remote session?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: With a small charge, we offer on-demand documentation, remote support, explanation etc
